name: theCADcube
overview:
theCADcube is an innovative online platform for architects, interior designers and similar design professionals to search, share and download 3D CAD representations of leading and niche manufacturer products.

Products range from furniture, lighting and other design elements to building components.

For design professionals, this makes it easy to source products for a project quickly, in a format that is not only useful, but one which improves the efficiency and realism of the CAD modeling process.

Some of the CAD models available on theCADcube are provided directly by the manufacturers and some of them have been created by theCADcubeâ€™s technical team; made up of qualified Architectural Technologists, based on the details provided by the manufacturers. Either way, all of the 3D CAD models are accurate representations of real life products.

So, on the one hand, we are an online efficiency tool for professionals within architecture and design sectors and on the other, an innovative marketing platform for product manufacturers.

Manufacturers can create their own company profile, with relevant information; Contact details, logoâ€™s, links etc., and upload existing 3D CAD models of their products to be downloaded by the community of registered designers.

The two functions are tied together together with some social elements; a ratings system so designers can leave feedback on each products CAD models; an inbuilt messaging system allowing designers and manufacturers to interact with one another; live statistics for manufacturers to monitor downloads of their products and CADspaceâ„¢, a feature that allows designers to save products and share them with other users, be that a colleague or client.
